name: Borys.exe
description:
Hello! Welcome to Borys.exe, a short game about Iq-Lowering Pumpkin farms, Mysterious EXE Labs, and an unhealthy amount of vine boom sound effects 

MAIN PLOT

One time, there was a small boy named Borys, who lives without his parents and with his friends somehow, who was walking down the road when he suddenly met a nice gentleman named "Borys.exe" As his Friend Martin disclaims later in the game. Will Borys manage to banish this annoying nuisance from his life, or will he fail even trying... to try 

The Game Includes...

  • 2 Bosses, and 1 secret one
  • custom art and music
  • Borys

CREDITS 

Borys199

Composer, Artist, Developer, Writer, Ideas Guy, Basically did everything there's no one else: https://youtube.com/channel/UC56s0HaBM31_Lq8oSXdP4Tg 

My Friend Denis

Got to play it before release 

This is my first ever Game, so I would really want your criticism and opinion if you have any!!! 

I'll meet you at the unnamed restaurant.
